graphics.notes: VDC has dedicated video RAM and is accessed via registers $D600/$D601. It supports color attributes.

speed_control.constraints: VIC-IIe screen is blanked in 2MHz mode unless in border. VDC works fine in 2MHz.

coding_rules: Use MMU ($FF00) to switch banks (RAM 0, RAM 1, ROMs).
Zero Page is relocatable via MMU.
VDC access is slow; check status bit before writing.
